snippet: Benjamin Britten’s opera “Noye’s Fludde” (“Noah’s Flood”) will be performed to benefit a school for blind musicians, the Filomen M. D’Agostino Greenburg Music School.
abstract: Benjamin Britten’s opera, Noye’s Fludde, is being performed to benefit the Filomen M D’Agostino Greenburg Music School for blind musicians
lead_paragraph: Benjamin Britten’s opera “Noye’s Fludde” (“Noah’s Flood”) will be performed to benefit a school for blind musicians, the Filomen M. D’Agostino Greenburg Music School.
